rules_text: Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment. If that permanent's mana value was 3 or greater, its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. [i](A transformed permanent retains the mana value of its front face.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]In the absence of self, there is absence of sin.[/i]
